resources.string: In the first tutorial you learn how to move Menucs: Walking and jumping!
Welcome to the Mencus Tutorial! Here you will learn how to control Mencus and how to interact with the game. Of-course you will also learn to use magic to defeat your enemies.

In this first tutorial you will learn how to move Mencus.
Touch the two arrow-buttons on the left side to stir Mencus left or right.
There is a obstacle next to you. Use the jump button on the right side!
Congratulations you learned how to move Mencus! Reach the flag to finish this tutorial
